text: Cameroon competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Cameroon entered one swimmer. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left|Charly Ndjoume |align=left|50 m freestyle |28.45 |122 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Cameroon at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Cameroon at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
